subject: Implement Phase 9: Compliance Analyzer Module
body:
Add comprehensive compliance analysis for inter-company software transactions:

- Transfer pricing risk scoring with weighted factors (margin compliance,
  documentation, substance, comparability, consistency)
- Accounting treatment summaries for Developer and Buyer perspectives
- Tax impact analysis with Section 11(e) schedules, CGT calculations,
  timing differences, and deferred tax
- Six compliance checklists (written agreements, TP documentation,
  development phase, cost tracking, control assessment, related party)
- Interactive UI with risk dashboard, heat map visualization,
  tab-based navigation, and PDF export capability
title: Implement Phase 9: Compliance Analyzer Module
